meanings.definition: A tool used for trimming or shaping the edges of something.
meanings.sent1: The gardener used the edgers to neatly trim the edges of the lawn.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy new edgers for my woodworking projects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the edgers for toys and scattered them around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the edgers was like a painter carefully outlining a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The sharp blades of the edgers made the task quick and efficient.

meanings.definition: A person who works on the edges of a field or garden.
meanings.sent1: The edgers planted flowers along the borders of the garden.
meanings.sent2: The friendly edgers greeted everyone passing by the farm.
meanings.sent3: The edgers organized a fun picnic right at the edge of the field.
meanings.sent4: She was like an edgers herself, always on the outskirts of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The diligent edgers kept the field tidy and well-maintained.

meanings.definition: A device used to create a straight edge on a piece of paper or fabric.
meanings.sent1: The student used the edgers to make perfect borders on the project.
meanings.sent2: I misplaced my edgers, so I had to cut the paper freehand.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the edgers off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The edgers glided smoothly along the paper, creating a flawless edge.
meanings.sent5: The sharp blade of the edgers ensured a clean and precise cut every time.
